title: Please help me to find out this type
content:
anybody knows what this typeface is?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [America SONG.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140723055104/http:/typophile.com/files/America%20SONG_1.jpg) | 464.21 KB |
author: rukiye

comments.content:
Same comments as your other post: Please edit the title to make it more descriptive, and include an image, or link to one.

- Mike Yanega

\>anybody knows what this typeface is?  
It's called Georgia :)

All of the 'e's are different - this was hand-cut. Vivaldi is similar.

- Lex
Mike has already solved it [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20140723055104/http:/typophile.com/node/62774) as Ingrid aka Ingenius.

i need to know what typeface is used on this image. it's urgent. please help!

[http://www.etrailer.com/Merchant2/graphics/00000001/faq/Mdemo-Fire-dance...](http://web.archive.org/web/20140723055104/http:/www.etrailer.com/Merchant2/graphics/00000001/faq/Mdemo-Fire-dancer_644.jpg "http://www.etrailer.com/Merchant2/graphics/00000001/faq/Mdemo-Fire-dancer\_644.jpg")

"Fire Dancer"

My boss is asking and there is a bottle of scotch end of it. please please.

[http://www.etrailer.com/Merchant2/graphics/00000001/faq/Mdemo-Fire-dance...](http://web.archive.org/web/20140723055104/http:/www.etrailer.com/Merchant2/graphics/00000001/faq/Mdemo-Fire-dancer_644.jp "http://www.etrailer.com/Merchant2/graphics/00000001/faq/Mdemo-Fire-dancer\_644.jp")

[Textile](http://web.archive.org/web/20140723055104/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/apple/textile/).  
Contact me and I’ll tell you where to send the scotch.

Just know that Jan only drinks moonshine.

hhp

Regarding the first post: The original typeface was Ingrid by Markus Low for VGC. Today, it can be had as the wonderful [Messenger](http://web.archive.org/web/20140723055104/http:/old.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/messenger/) by Canada Type. It contains all of the original's alternates.
